text: While the [[Galifar Code of Justice|Code of Galifar]] provides the basis for civil rights in [[Karrnath]], the Code of [[Kaius|Kaius ir'Wynarn I]] that developed from it is more rigid and less forgiving. Many rights have been restricted or eliminated in the name of national defense. The nation has labored under this system of martial law since the earliest days of the [[Last War]], when it was instituted by King [[Kaius I|Kaius ir'Wynarn I]]. A handful of the more oppressive laws have been lifted with the end of the war, but the overall martial system remainsâ€”a system most [[Karrns|Culture of Karrnath]] are content with.
title: Code of Kaius
